description: Leicester City: When You're Smiling podcast
title: Leicester City: When You're Smiling podcast
title_page: Leicester City: When You're Smiling podcast - BBC Sport
maintext:
Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall is "a future Leicester captain... if he stays."
So says former Foxes winger Matt Piper who relished watching the midfielder turn in a match-winning performance in the M69 derby against Coventry on Sunday.
Hear his thoughts - and those of boss Enzo Maresca - on the latest When You're Smiling podcast from BBC Radio Leicester.
